rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0001
rows.name: We're back here...

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0002
rows.name:
This is where my whole adventure
with Rex really began.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, right. This must be the spot
where you and Rex washed up.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0004
rows.name:
Though we only made it here
thanks to Gramps's efforts.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0005
rows.name:
And those efforts are the reason
I'm like this now...

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, if you stayed that big you
couldn't exactly travel with us.
I'd say you're just right!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0007
rows.name:
If I was my old self, I'd be able
to carry you anywhere!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, anywhere within reason.
The World Tree would be pushing it.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0009
rows.name: Amazing!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0010
rows.name:
So how long it take you to
get to Avaritia from here?

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0011
rows.name:
At the current separation, let's see...
About ten days travel.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0012
rows.name: That long?!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0013
rows.name:
"You'd do it faster than that or you'd
taste the whip!" is what I'm hearing.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0014
rows.name:
Of course that's not what I mean. But
that's like three or four days by boat.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0015
rows.name:
My apologies.
I'm not as young as I used to be.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0016
rows.name:
What is point of worrying now
Gramps not big any more?

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0017
rows.name:
True enough.
That old body is a thing of the past!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0018
rows.name:
Well I think you are adorable
like this. I like it.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0019
rows.name: Well, that's very kind of you, Homura.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0020
rows.name: Are you blushing, oldster?

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0021
rows.name:
Tell me, Rex. Do you ever wish
I was in my old form?

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0022
rows.name: Which form do I prefer?

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0023
rows.name: I liked it better when you were big.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0024
rows.name: I think you're better like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh...
Is that so...

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0102
rows.name:
I suppose you found me very
useful as a Divine Beast.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0103
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0104
rows.name:
I provided a home...carried you from
place to place... Not to mention the
salvaging crane stuck you-know-where.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0105
rows.name: That's not really what I meant!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0106
rows.name:
It's just that you were so big
and dependable. Like a dad,
or, well, a real grandpa.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0107
rows.name:
Besides, I knew you in that form
for most of my life.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0108
rows.name:
Everyone else only really knows you
like this, but I'm not used to it.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0109
rows.name: Rex has a point.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0110
rows.name:
The time when I knew you before,
Seiryuu, is very faint in my mind.
This is the Gramps I'm used to.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0111
rows.name: Tora cannot imagine big Gramps!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0112
rows.name:
Hana never seen big Gramps,
so also cannot picture.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0113
rows.name:
Right?
That's what I thought.
It's all about what you're used to.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0114
rows.name:
Hmmm...
I'll give you the benefit of the doubt.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0115
rows.name:
Though I know you're really just
pining for the days when you could
travel in comfort on my back.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0201
rows.name:
Oho...
You prefer me this way?

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0202
rows.name:
It's cool to have you riding on
MY back for a change!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0203
rows.name:
I'm not much more than a beginner
at this whole Driver thing...

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0204
rows.name:
Just hearing you encourage me from
behind really sets my heart at ease.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0205
rows.name:
And when you were big, we couldn't
just, y'know, hang out or walk together.
I like being able to stay close.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0206
rows.name: I see, I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0207
rows.name: You look rather pleased, Seiryuu.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0208
rows.name:
If I were to be honest, Rex's helmet
is a little cramped.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0209
rows.name:
Not to mention the jolting and bumping
and bouncing around. It's enough to
make me lose my lunch at times.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0210
rows.name:
But hearing Rex say that, for the first
time it made me think that perhaps
this was actually a good thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0211
rows.name:
I'm sorry about the jolting. Looks like
I've gotta get used to this situation too.

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0212
rows.name:
That's all right, Rex. I'll keep the
words of encouragement coming!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0213
rows.name:
I shall endeavor to become
ever more reliable!

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0214
rows.name: Um...

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0215
rows.name:
Actually, if you're planning on nagging
me constantly, maybe I'll pass...

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0216
rows.name:
Yeah, I wouldn't want to have
Byakko's nagging voice in my ear
all the time, either...

rows.label: kizunatalk006_msg0217
rows.name: Cheeky sods!
